['DescriptionAscot & Co. are proud to present this brand new (never lived in) J-type villa in Mira Oasis 3. It is a middle unit and finished with dark wood. The asking price is 25% less than the cost to buy new making this a fantastic deal.
The property has covered parking for 2 cars and also a separate exit for the maid. Downstairs you have the maid room, laundry to your left. There is under stairs storage and a separate study room with full sliding glass doors. The guest bathroom has a shower so the study could be used as a guest bathroom. You then have the combined living/dining area and on to the kitchen.
Upstairs the property features two balconies, two bathrooms, fitted wardrobes and walk-in closet for the master bedroom.
Call now to arrange a viewing.

descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is delighted to list this sought-after yacht harbour One-bedroom apartment with a spectacular marina view that knows how to create an impression. Properties like this are just for the decisive few.
This is an incomparable flat in a popular yacht marina location at Bulgari Resort & Residences, Jumeirah, Dubai, that titillates with its unrivalled design, capacious 1,619 sq.ft floorplan, and transfixing marina view that is sure to catch your eye.
All the amenities you'll need are right there.
It has 1 master bedroom, an à la mode living room, entrance hall, a charming one-wall kitchen with a breakfast bar, and a noticeably private veranda that's great for hosting family and friends.
Bulgari Resort & Residences Dubai is the ultimate expression of style and sophistication on a private island off the coast of Dubai. The resort and residences are one of only six places in the world where people can enjoy the richness and exclusivity of the Bvlgari lifestyle.
It was developed by MERAAS, and when we recently visited it for inspection we found it in a newly-minted condition. There are heaps of notably unique features that you can discern, once you come for a viewing.
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Reality for exclusive viewing and project overview of this extra-ordinary property."]

The accommodation is bright and spacious including a modified eat-in kitchen with central island, dining room, living room, maid's room, external driver's room, living room, family room and a downstairs guest bedroom. There are two stairways, one leading to a guest suite and the other main staircase taking you up to first floor which offers five bedrooms, all of which have direct access to a bathroom, the master bedroom has extra storage, a 4 piece bathroom and terrace.
